question:
Which of the following activities are allowed in the mangroves and coral reefs which are categorized as CRZ-I areas?
1) Projects relating to the Department of Atomic Energy.
2) Installation of weather radar.
3) Construction of trans harbour sea link.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The following activities are allowed in the mangroves and coral reefs which are categorized as CRZ-I areas?
1) Projects relating to the Department of Atomic Energy.
2) Installation of weather radar.
3) Construction of trans harbour sea link.
